  • ‚úÖ Optimized scroll handlers

üé® Design System Summary

Colors:

--accent-red: #c41e3a    /* Barber pole red */
--accent-blue: #1e40af   /* Barber pole blue */
--brass-gold: #FFD700    /* Pole caps */
--success: #10b981       /* Success states */
--error: #ef4444         /* Error states */
--warning: #f59e0b       /* Warning states */

Spacing (4px Grid):

--space-2: 0.5rem   /* 8px */
--space-3: 0.75rem  /* 12px */
--space-4: 1rem     /* 16px */
--space-6: 1.5rem   /* 24px */
--space-8: 2rem     /* 32px */
--space-12: 3rem    /* 48px */

Border Radius:

--radius-sm: 4px
--radius-md: 8px
--radius-lg: 16px
--radius-xl: 24px
--radius-2xl: 32px
--radius-full: 9999px

Transitions:

--ease-smooth: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)
--duration-fast: 200ms
--duration-normal: 300ms
--duration-slow: 500ms

üí° Quick Reference

Show Toast Notification:

Toast.success('Operation completed!');
Toast.error('Something went wrong');
Toast.warning('Approaching limit');
Toast.info('Processing...');

Add Loading State:

button.classList.add('is-loading');
// ... do work ...
button.classList.remove('is-loading');

Enable Form Validation:

<form data-validate>
  <div class="form-field">
    <input type="email" required>
    <div class="form-error"></div>
  </div>
</form>

Use Breadcrumbs:






<nav class="breadcrumbs" aria-label="Breadcrumb">
  <a href="/">Home</a>
  
  
    
    
      
    
      
        
        <span class="breadcrumb-separator" aria-hidden="true">‚Ä∫</span>
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        <a href="/docs/">Documentation</a>
      
    
      
    
    
    
    
      <span class="breadcrumb-separator" aria-hidden="true">‚Ä∫</span>
      <span class="breadcrumb-current" aria-current="page">BarberX Complete Platform Status ‚Äî Session Summary</span>
    
  
</nav>

üåü Standout Features
